name: Pikiinya! Excellent
overview: Pikinya Excellent! is a puzzle game that got different game modes (vs, story, tutorial, records & gallery mode that will be unlocked playing the main game). In the game the player have to make lines using the puzzle pieces provided by the game, meanwhile his character will run in a circuit and will only advance when the player complete a line in the puzzle. There is a time limit to complete the stage.
